songs.title: Ur So Gay (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like boys

[Drop 1]
You're gay - boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy, boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay - boy, boy, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay - boy, boy, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy, boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy

[Drop 2]
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy, boy, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy, boy

[Drop 3]
You're, you're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay (boy, boy, boy...)
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like boys

[Drop 4]
You're gay - boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy, boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay - boy, boy, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay - boy, boy, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy, boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay, gay, gay - boy
You're gay, boy
So gay, gay, gay - (boy, boy, boy...)
(So, so, so, so...)

[Chorus]
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
You're so gay, and you don't even like boys
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like
No, you don't even like boys

[Drop 5]
Boy, boy, boy, boy, boy
Gay, gay, boy, boy
Boy, boy, boy, boy, boy
Gay, gay, boy, boy
You're gay boy, boy, boy
Gay, gay, boy, boy
You're gay boy
So, gay, gay, boy, boy, boy
So, gay, gay, gay, gay, boy (boy, boy, boy...)
So, gay, gay, boy, boy
So, gay, gay, boy (boy, boy, boy...)

[Drop 6]
You're so gay, gay, gay, gay, gay, gay, gay, gay
So gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy
You're so gay, boy, boy
